Title: Tooms
Plot: Eugene Tooms is released from the sanitarium, and Mulder becomes personally involved to ensure that he is caught in the act of getting the last human liver he needs to go into hibernation for another 30 years.
GuestStars: Doug Hutchison, Paul Ben-Victor, Timothy Webber, Frank C. Turner, Gillian Carfra, Pat Bermel, Jan D'Arcy, Jerry Wasserman, Mikal Dughi, Glynis Davies, Steve Adams, Andre Daniels, Catherine Lough, Henry Beckman
